vote.title: Authorize a twenty-two-month construction services contract for the 2024 Barrier Free Ramp Improvements along Dallas Area Rapid Transit (DART) Bus Routes that includes water and wastewater adjustments at various locations throughout the City - Estrada Concrete Company, LLC, lowest responsible bidder of two - Not to exceed $33,848,975.00 - Financing: DART Transportation Projects Fund
